story.storykicker: The Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Guwahati, has released an employment notification, inviting interested, eligible candidates to apply for the position of Technical Officer Grade-III. The last date for the submission of an online application is June 15.
story.storybody:
The Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Guwahati, has released an employment notification, inviting interested, eligible candidates to apply for the position of Technical Officer Grade-III.

Vacancy details

Total posts: 9

Name of the posts:

Technical Officer Grade-III

Departments

  • Centre for Educational Technology: 1
  • Department of Design: 3
  • Computer & Communication Centre: 3
  • Department of Physics: 1
  • Dept. of Electronics and Electrical Engineering:1

Eligibility criteria

Educational qualification:

The candidates interested in applying for this post should have done BE/ BTech/ MSc. in relevant subject and must possess preferably one year working experience.

Age limit:

The age of the candidates applying for this post must not exceed 35 years. Relaxation in age will be provided as per the government norms.

Selection procedure:

A written test/skill test/interview will be conducted for shortlisting and final selection of the candidates. Persons employed in govt./semi govt. organisations /autonomous bodies must submit NOC from their employer at the time of a written test/ skill test/ interview.

Pay scale:

The selected candidates will be getting a monthly salary of Rs 15,600 to Rs 39,100, along with a grade pay of Rs 5,400.

How to apply:

The candidates interested in these posts are required to apply at the official website www.iitg.ac.in or www.iitg.ernet.in.

Important date:

The last date for the submission of an online application is June 15.

Read: SBI recruitment 2016: Apply for Officer post before June 14

Read: Want to join Medical profession? Apply now at AIIMS Bhubaneswar

For information on more latest government jobs, click here.
